A Special Place in Heaven

26 February 2023


If you wait for long enough,
You will get what you deserve.
Just stay silent, don’t rebuff—
Heaven’s got a place reserved.

Place where only patient go.
Those who do anticipate.
Place where you and I belong—
Those who are deliberate.

Sometimes things just need to pass,
Sometimes waiting is the prize.
Other times they’d better last.
No one’s waiting for demise.
